title: The Red Badge of Courage (Part 9)
description: Henry's comrades welcome him back to the regiment and tend his wound. They accept his explanation that he became separated from them after his head was grazed by a bullet during the fighting. Henry is surprised to see how his friend Wilson ("the loud soldier") has matured following the battle.
